website_summaries.verdict: A cute Pillow Pet that is perfect for Paw Patrol fans, as it is in the likeness of one of the cartoon's most popular characters.
pros: Adorable Marshall the dalmatian from the popular children's series Paw Patrol
Features Marshall's bright red firefighter attire
cons: Not quite as large as some other Pillow Pets, but this isn't a major issue

customer_reviews.title: Good size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2yr old son who LOVES skye. It made a great addition to his bedset. He was overjoyed to see skye and seems to be comfortable to him as he takes his naps. It is very soft! I did notice it is smaller then other pillow pets we have. Definitely more for a toddler. I don't see it being big enough for a bigger kid to use as a pillow. Looks great and seems to be good quality. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Good size and everything I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing and I the kid loved it. The costume and stitching is great quality and looks just like the character from Paw Patrol. It seems a little smaller than some other pillow pets I’ve seen, but I bought it for a four-year-old. I usually don’t write reviews, but this is an amazing gift so I did. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kissam

customer_reviews.title: My three year old son loves this Marshall Pillow Pet!
customer_reviews.text: I had concerns when purchasing it about how comfortable the face and helmet area would be to lay on but it is very plush and comfy. We got this for my son to use at daycare and he loves it. It also has a velcro strap to fold it up when not using it as a pillow and then an additional piece of fabric that covers the velcro when not in use, which is a nice touch. The only downside is that the white fabric lost its vibrancy so quick. Usually I can get the color back when washing in oxy-clean but that was not the case. Considering its for a toddler I guess that's to be expected though.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be, but my 3 year old loves it. His head fits in it for sleeping but not for much larger of a child
customer_reviews.author: ARLaGuardia

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I ORDERED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Paw Patrol stuffed toy for my granddaughter. What I got was a blue Dino. Not at all what I ordered... NOT EVEN CLOSE.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Russell

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My child was asking for a "big" Chase stuffed animal for bedtime, and this is perfect. He is still a little too young to turn the pillow back into a standing stuffed animal, but he still loves it. The velcro has a built in flap that covers it over when as a pillow, so that it doesn't scratch your child. This causes some of the difficulty for him closing it himself, but worth preventing the scratches it would cause otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but ultimately not practical. My 4 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but ultimately not practical. My 4 year old wanted to use it as his bed-time pillow, but it is too small and uncomfortable. So it just lays there next to a real pillow that he uses.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pillow in our house
customer_reviews.text: Our kid loves Pillow Pets and he loves Paw Patrol. When we found this pillow we knew we needed to get it for him. He loves it and has to sleep with it every night. We have purchased several different animals, and our kids have loved all of them. They are soft and fun to lay on. They also wash in the washing machine really well. We have washed ours several times and they are still soft and look great. We have even purchased smaller versions for when we travel since our kids insist on sleeping with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Velcro will not hold in shape of dog
customer_reviews.text: Ok for pillow...but velcro will not hold to create the dog form..very disappointed with product... Mfg should have used a better quality of velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 3 yr old niece. She loved it. My only complaint is that the quality of the pillow pet brand has decreased over the years.

product_meta.title: Pillow Pets Nickelodeon Paw Patrol, Marshall Dalmatian, 16" Stuffed Animal Plush Toy
product_meta.description: Color:Paw Patrol MarshallPillow Pets has teamed with Nickelodeon to create your own favorite Paw Patrol character Marshall! The popular series, Paw Patrol, is a CG-animated, action-adventure preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. When trouble strikes Adventure Bay, these heroic pups are there to save the day with a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles, and cute doggy humor. From Marshall, the firedog, to Chase, the police pup, and Skye the High flying' Copter, each character brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. It’s a Pillow, it’s a Pet… It’s a Pillow Pet. A super-soft chenille plush folding stuffed animal so cuddly you’ll never want to put it down! An ideal naptime companion – not to mention a comforting partner on road trips or airplane rides – Pillow Pets are anything but just another toddler pillow. The Pillow Pets Nickelodeon Paw Patrol Marshall starts out as your pal, then un-velcro its belly, and it magically becomes your pillow! A bedtime solution that will have your kids running to their room with their new pet for a good night’s rest on their new favorite pillow. Made of high-quality washable chenille. BPA and phthalates free. Opens to a 16-inch pillow. As with all decorative pillows, not recommended for children under the age of 3.
feature_bullets: READY FOR A RUFF RUFF RESCUE: Your favorite Dalmatian from PAW Patrol is now a Pillow Pet! Join Marshall and the rest of his friends to save the day at Adventure Bay. Marshall is always ready to take out any fires!

COMFORTING COMPANION: Pillow Pets presents super soft, cute, & adorable stuffed animals that unfold into fuzzy pillows for sleep. Kids, teens, & adults love these classic & collectible comfy critters.
COMFORT: This plush is a pal by day, then unfasten its belly to make a pillow by night! Comfortable travel friend for any child on road trips & airplanes. Also use as boy & girl bedroom decoration.
BEST BUDDY: Children of all ages will love this original toy for play & as a large pillow for reading, watching television, studying, and sleepy nap time. Youth love to read with this cozy creature.

SPECS: Official Pillow Pets & licensed Nickelodeon item. High-quality chenille. BPA & Phthalates free. Unfastens to 16-in pillow. To wash, put in white pillow case & tie open end. Cold water. Gentle cycle.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars693 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
